Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #71 buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to utility maintenance at Commercial/103rd.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Halsted
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Halsted, Addison and Broadway: due to, street blockage near Broadway/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Halsted, Addison and Broadway: due to, street blockage near Broadway/Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Karlov
ShortDescription: 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Addison, Pulaski and Milwaukee: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Karlov.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Addison, Pulaski, Milwaukee and over regular route, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Karlov.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie and #65 Grand Temporary Reroute near Sacramento/Grand
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie and 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Sacramento/Grand, due to street blockage near Sacramento/Grand.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#52 Kedzie and #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Sacramento/Grand, due to street blockage near Sacramento/Grand.

Northbound #52 Kedzie buses will operate via Kedzie, Grand, Augusta, Homan, Chicago, Kedzie and over regular route.

Southbound #52 Kedzie buses will operate via Chicago, Sacramento, Augusta, Kedzie and over regular route.

#65 Grand buses will operate via Grand, Sacramento, Augusta, Grand and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #44 Wallace-Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine/82nd
ShortDescription: #44 Wallace-Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, 83rd, Loomis, 79th, and Racine, due to street blockage near Racine/82nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace-Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, 83rd, Loomis, 79th, and Racine then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Racine/82nd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Eastbound  Reroute near Cermak/Kildare
ShortDescription: Eastbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Kostner, Ogden, and Cermak, due to street blockage near Cermak/Kildare.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Kostner, Ogden, and Cermak, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Cermak/Kildare.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green ine Service Delayed at Conservatory
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Conservatory due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Conservatory due to a sick customer.

Also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
